summary: This is an email correspondence from defense attorneys to Judge Nathan regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's response to the government's notice about her Rule 17 subpoenas. The document indicates the defense is submitting their response directly to the court due to potential protective order concerns and will coordinate with the government on redactions before public filing.

persons.name: Nicole Simmons
persons.context: Attorney from Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C. who sent the email to Judge Nathan regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's response to government subpoenas.

persons.name: Nathan
persons.context: Judge Nathan presiding over U.S. v. Maxwell case, recipient of the email regarding the Rule 17 subpoena response.

persons.name: Jeffrey S. Pagliuca
persons.context: Attorney from Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C. who is listed as respectfully submitting the response along with Nicole Simmons.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Attorney cc'd on the email regarding the Rule 17 subpoena response in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Bobbi Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney cc'd on the email regarding the Rule 17 subpoena response in the Maxwell case.

events.title: Government Notice on Rule 17 Subpoenas
events.description: The government filed a notice regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's Rule 17 subpoenas, which the defense is responding to in this correspondence.

events.title: Defense Response Submission
events.description: Defense attorneys submit Ghislaine Maxwell's response to the government's April 5 notice regarding Rule 17 subpoenas directly to the court.

keyFacts: The document is part of U.S. v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) proceedings.
Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team is responding to the government's April 5, 2021 notice regarding her Rule 17 subpoenas.
The defense is submitting their response directly to the court due to potential protective order concerns.
The defense will confer with the government regarding redactions before filing the response on the public docket.
The defense law firm Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C. is based in Denver, Colorado.
